meaning_str.bing:
v. 参加；出席；注意；专心
网络. 照顾；照料；上

出席；参加；注意；专心；致力于；照顾；照料；护理；伴随；陪同；处理；定期访问；经常去（某处）；听从；服从

1.en: But the president said the most important guests were the Allied veterans who were able to attend.
1.cn: 奥巴马总统指出，最尊贵的嘉宾是能来参加仪式的盟军老兵。

2.en: Something wrong must have happened if he did not come to attend the meeting as I told him.
2.cn: 昨天他没有按照我吩咐的参加会议，一定有什么事发生了。

3.en: Our correspondent said a Taliban leader had been due to attend the meeting but dropped out in the last minute citing health reasons.
3.cn: 据记者称一名塔利班领导人原定出席本次会议，但在最后一刻因健康理由放弃了。

0.en: I wanted to attend my own funeral. I mean, I'm hopeful that I'll be able to attend as a ghost, but…
0.cn: 我想参加我自己的葬礼。我是说，我希望到时候是我的鬼魂去参加，但是……

1.en: But I'm simply gonna have to ask you to leave because I have a wedding to attend my own.
1.cn: 但现在请你离开，因为我得参加我的婚礼了。

2.en: You are no longer a member of the military. You're unable to attend this meeting. I'm sorry.
2.cn: 您不再是军人。你不能参加此审议，我很遗憾。

3.en: You shall attend my cousin Kaidu's feast tonight. I await your thoughts on a lesser culture.
3.cn: 你去参加今晚海都举办的宴会吧，我想听听你对我们这些略逊色文化的看法。

4.en: Which, by the way, is something you don't want to attend wearing a Star Trek ensign's uniform.
4.cn: 顺便提一下，这种博览会肯定不是你想穿着别有星际迷航徽章的衣服参加的。

5.en: You can't just declare yourself president. I didn't. I called a meeting, I was the only one to attend.
5.cn: 你不能凭个人意愿就当主席。我没有。我开了会的，只有我自己参加。

6.en: I'm e-mailing all the neighborhood business owners to attend an emergency meeting tonight at the diner.
6.cn: 我在给附近街区所有店主发电邮，让他们到餐厅去参加紧急店主大会。

7.en: Well, thanks a lot for hooking me up, Rach. I want you to know that I want you to attend our wedding as my guest.
7.cn: 谢谢你替我们搞好关系，我想请你做为我的客人参加我们的婚礼。

8.en: We've invited Russia and China to attend, but we didn't wanna move forward until we had congressional approval.
8.cn: 我们已邀请俄国和中国参加，但国会批准前，我们不想采取进一步行动。

9.en: Step 6: Attend a Chinese New Year parade, one of the most popular ways to celebrate the holiday's hopeful spirit.
9.cn: 第六步：参加中国新年游行，这是最受欢迎的方式之一来庆祝新年新气象。

10.en: Next time I have a meeting in the shower, you're welcome to attend. Sheldon. Sheldon for president. I pick Sheldon!
10.cn: 下一次我在浴室开会时，欢迎你来参加。谢尔顿。谢尔顿主席。我选谢尔顿！

11.en: I wanted to thank you for going through all the trouble of planning a second wedding ceremony for me, but unfortunately I cannot attend.
11.cn: 我想感谢你为了我大费周章策划了第二次结婚典礼，但很遗憾 我不能参加。

12.en: Guess who the university is sending to Switzerland to attend a conference and see the CERN super collider on February 14?
12.cn: 你们猜学校要派谁去瑞士参加研讨会并参观欧洲核子研究委员会的超级对撞机，就在二月十四日？

13.en: I'm not a stop along the way, I'm a destination. And if you refuse to attend, I'm gonna have to find a replacement. Girls, the waiting list.
13.cn: 我不是个中途站，我是终点，如果你拒绝参加，我会找个代替者的，女孩们，候选名单。

14.en: Our royal family will attend the private services in St. James's palace the morning of with 28 other heads of state from all over the globe.
14.cn: 皇室成员当天早晨会在圣詹姆斯宫参加一个私人拜会，其余28位各国首脑届时也会一同出席。

15.en: Now that you're in my debt, please manipulate Amy into releasing me from my commitment to attend her aunt's tedious birthday party. Not a chance.
15.cn: 拿人家的手软，吃人家的嘴短，麻烦你在艾米耳边吹吹风别让我去参加她姨妈的无聊生日派对。不可能。

16.en: Furthermore, at the behest of the prince, it is hereby declared that every maiden in the kingdom, be she noble or commoner is invited to attend. Such is the command of our most noble king.
16.cn: 此外，根据王子的命令，在此宣布，王国之内所有未婚少女，无论贵族或平民，都被邀请参加舞会。以上为我们最尊贵的国王的命令。

17.en: So, what's up? Well, Penny is on her way to perform in a one-night showcase production of rent, which we are unable to attend, because we're going to a symposium on molecular positronium given by Dr. Emil Farman Farmian.
17.cn: 怎么了？潘妮正要去一个出租用品展示会进行表演，而我们不能去了，因为我们要去参加由伊米尔·法尔曼法尔米安博士主讲的关于分子正负的研讨会。

19.en: That is your business. Now, I have other matters to attend to.
19.cn: 那是你家的事，我还有别的事要忙。
